title: How to watch The Essex Serpent starring Tom Hiddleston and Claire Danes
content:
The Essex Serpent is available now on Apple TV+, starring Tom Hiddleston as pastor Will Ransome and Claire Danes as Cora Seaborne. An Essex town is wrapped in mystery as rumors of a mythical serpent gain traction following the disappearance of a young girl. The limited series is based on a .
